description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝
description.en: The 12th Emperor of the Ming dynasty

description.zh-cn: 明世宗生父，被追尊为皇帝
description.en: Biological father of the Jiajing Emperor, posthumously honored as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗生母
description.en: Biological mother of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十一代皇帝，明世宗堂兄
description.en: The 11th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, cousin of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗第三子，明朝第十三位皇帝
description.en: Third son of the Jiajing Emperor, the 13th emperor of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十位皇帝，明世宗之伯父
description.en: The 10th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, paternal uncle of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第九位皇帝，明世宗之祖父
description.en: The 9th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, grandfather of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，在大礼议事件中与明世宗对立
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty, opposed the Jiajing Emperor during the Great Rites Controversy.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，在大礼议事件中支持明世宗
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty, supported the Jiajing Emperor during the Great Rites Controversy.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，在嘉靖后期专权二十年
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty, dominated the government for 20 years during Jiajing's later reign.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，以上《治安疏》直谏闻名
description.en: Ming Dynasty official, famous for his direct criticism of the emperor in the 'Memorial on Peace and Order'.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，以抗击倭寇闻名
description.en: Ming Dynasty general, famous for fighting against the Wokou pirates.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，与戚继光齐名，以抗击倭寇闻名
description.en: Ming Dynasty general, as famous as Qi Jiguang for fighting against the Wokou pirates.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古土默特部首领，嘉靖年间多次寇边
description.en: Leader of the Tümed Mongols, frequently raided the Ming border during the Jiajing era.

description.zh-cn: 明朝太医，在壬寅宫变后救活明世宗
description.en: Imperial physician of the Ming Dynasty, saved the Jiajing Emperor's life after the Renyin Palace Incident.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，在明世宗驾崩后主持大局
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty, managed state affairs after the Jiajing Emperor's death.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗皇贵妃，明穆宗生母
description.en: Imperial consort of the Jiajing Emperor and biological mother of the Longqing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗皇后，明武宗生母，议定由朱厚熜继位
description.en: Empress of the Hongzhi Emperor, mother of the Zhengde Emperor, she decided that Zhu Houcong should succeed the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗为追尊其生父而与朝臣发生的严重政治冲突
description.en: A major political conflict between the Jiajing Emperor and court officials over the posthumous title of his biological father.

description.zh-cn: 数名宫女试图缢杀明世宗的事件
description.en: An incident where several palace maids attempted to strangle the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗统治前期的改革与整顿时期
description.en: A period of reform and consolidation during the early reign of the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 发生于嘉靖年间的一次特大地震，是人类历史上死亡人数最多的地震
description.en: A massive earthquake that occurred during the Jiajing era, the deadliest earthquake in recorded human history.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖朝面临的北方蒙古与东南倭寇的双重边患问题
description.en: The dual border threats faced during the Jiajing reign from the northern Mongols and the southeastern Wokou pirates.

description.zh-cn: 一种源于中国的宗教与哲学思想体系
description.en: A religious and philosophical system originating in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 明代骚扰中国东南沿海的海盗
description.en: Pirates who raided the southeastern coast of China during the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明代湖广省地名，今湖北钟祥
description.en: A place in Huguang province during the Ming dynasty, now Zhongxiang, Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 明清两代的皇家宫殿
description.en: The imperial palace for the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 朱祐杬是明孝宗的异母弟，明世宗是明孝宗之侄。
description.en: Zhu Youyuan was the half-brother of the Hongzhi Emperor, making the Jiajing Emperor the nephew of the Hongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗驾崩后，作为内阁首辅议定由朱厚熜入继大统。
description.en: After the death of the Zhengde Emperor, as Grand Secretary, he arranged for Zhu Houcong to succeed to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗驾崩后，与杨廷和共同议定由朱厚熜入继大统。
description.en: After the death of the Zhengde Emperor, she and Yang Tinghe arranged for Zhu Houcong to succeed to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 坚持追尊自己的生父为皇帝，引发了大礼议之争。
description.en: Insisted on posthumously honoring his biological father as emperor, triggering the Great Rites Controversy.

description.zh-cn: 率领群臣反对明世宗追尊生父，要求明世宗改以明孝宗为父。
description.en: Led court officials in opposition, demanding that the Jiajing Emperor adopt the Hongzhi Emperor as his father.

description.zh-cn: 上疏支持明世宗追尊生父，成为议礼派核心人物。
description.en: Submitted memorials supporting the emperor's position, becoming a core figure in the pro-rites faction.

description.zh-cn: 在位前期进行改革，锐意图治，革除先朝蠹政，史称嘉靖中兴。
description.en: In his early reign, he carried out reforms, was determined to govern well, and eliminated the corrupt policies of the previous reign, which historians call the Jiajing Restoration.

description.zh-cn: 笃信道教，好长生不老之术，每年不断修设斋醮，并在西苑修仙。
description.en: He was a devout believer in Taoism, sought immortality, held numerous Taoist ceremonies annually, and practiced self-cultivation in the West Park.

description.zh-cn: 因不堪忍受虐待，数名宫女试图缢杀明世宗，致其险些丧命。
description.en: Unable to bear his abuse, several palace maids attempted to strangle him, nearly causing his death.

description.zh-cn: 在壬寅宫变后，使用“虎狼之药”救活了明世宗。
description.en: After the Renyin Palace Incident, he used potent medicine to revive the Jiajing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗深居西苑后，将政令皆交由严嵩父子打理，使其专权近二十年。
description.en: After retreating to the West Park, the Jiajing Emperor delegated all government affairs to Yan Song and his son, allowing them to monopolize power for nearly 20 years.

description.zh-cn: 上《治安疏》严厉批评明世宗怠政和迷信，触怒皇帝而被下狱。
description.en: Submitted the 'Memorial on Peace and Order' to harshly criticize the emperor's negligence and superstition, angering him and leading to his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 地震导致明朝国库连续两年亏空，对国力和财政状况造成严重影响。
description.en: The earthquake caused the Ming dynasty's state treasury to be in deficit for two consecutive years, severely impacting national strength and financial status.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖朝期间，北方蒙古寇边与东南倭寇侵扰导致边事废弛，对国家安全构成严重威胁。
description.en: During the Jiajing era, border raids by northern Mongols and incursions by southeastern Wokou pirates led to a decline in border defenses, posing a serious threat to national security.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖年间多次率领蒙古鞑靼部落寇边。
description.en: Led Mongol Tatar tribes to raid the border multiple times during the Jiajing era.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖年间侵扰中国东南沿海，造成严重破坏。
description.en: Raided the southeastern coast of China during the Jiajing era, causing severe destruction.

description.zh-cn: 率领军队肃清倭寇，保卫了东南沿海地区。
description.en: Led troops to eliminate the Wokou pirates, defending the southeastern coastal regions.

description.zh-cn: 率领军队肃清倭寇，保卫了东南沿海地区。
description.en: Led troops to eliminate the Wokou pirates, defending the southeastern coastal regions.

description.zh-cn: 在明世宗驾崩后，请裕王（后来的明穆宗）入宫主持丧礼，确保了权力平稳交接。
description.en: After the death of the Jiajing Emperor, he invited Prince Yu (later the Longqing Emperor) to preside over the funeral rites, ensuring a smooth transition of power.
